response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential impact, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market rate and is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible return on investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
